name: Blaster_Support.Ice_Manipulation
display_help: Ice Manipulation lets you surround yourself with various manifestations of ice and cold, assaulting and freezing nearby foes. Ice Manipulation powers are known to Slow opponents.

powers.name: Blaster_Support.Ice_Manipulation.Chilblain
powers.display_help: Immobilizes your target in an icy trap. Deals some damage over time and slightly Slows the target's attack and movement speed. Useful for keeping villains at bay. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Fast

display_info: 5 ticks of 12.51 cold damage over 9.2s on target
5 ticks of 21.21 cold damage over 9.2s on target
-30.00% run speed, fly speed for 18s on target
-20.00% strength to recharge for 18s on target
-20.00% strength to jump height for 18s on target
10000.00% resistance to knockup, knock for 15s on target
-100.0 knockup protection, knock protection for 15s on target
7.70% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 8.67s on self

powers.name: Blaster_Support.Ice_Manipulation.Frozen_Fists
powers.display_help: Frozen Fists encrusts your hands in ice, giving them the ability to quickly inflict moderate damage on villains. The foe's attack and movement speed is Slowed, due to the chills caused by the cold blows. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

display_info: -10.00% run speed, fly speed, jump speed for 5s on target
-10.00% strength to jump height, recharge for 5s on target
8.80% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 8.83s on self

powers.name: Blaster_Support.Ice_Manipulation.Ice_Sword
powers.display_help: You create a blade of solid ice that deals higher damage then Frozen Fists. Being hit by this Ice Sword will Slow a target's movement and attack speed, due to the intense chill. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

display_info: -10.00% strength to jump height for 8s on target

8.80% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 8.83s on self

powers.name: Blaster_Support.Ice_Manipulation.Chilling_Embrace
powers.display_help: While active, you dramatically lower the temperature around yourself, Slowing the attack rate of all nearby foes, as well as their movement speed and damage. The air around your body becomes so cold that attacks deflect off of it, granting you absorption, while your body becomes extremely energy efficient, granting you bonus Recovery. Recharge: Moderate
powers.display_short_help: Toggle: PBAoE, Foe -Recharge, -Speed, -DMG, Self +Absorb over Time, +Recovery

powers.name: Blaster_Support.Ice_Manipulation.Build_Up
powers.display_help: Greatly boosts your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases chance to hit. Recharge: Long

display_info: 100.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 10s on self

powers.name: Blaster_Support.Ice_Manipulation.Ice_Patch
powers.display_help: You emanate a patch of ice around you, which causes foes that step onto it to slip and fall down. This effect lasts until the ice melts. You must be near the ground to activate this power. Recharge: Slow

display_info: 22.90% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 10.97s on self

powers.name: Blaster_Support.Ice_Manipulation.Freezing_Touch
powers.display_help: This Freezing Touch will encase a single foe in a block of ice. This will deal minor damage as well as freezing them in their tracks, leaving them cold and helpless. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate

powers.name: Blaster_Support.Ice_Manipulation.Frozen_Aura
powers.display_help: Your mastery of cold enables you to dramatically lower the temperature immediately around you. Foes near you when you perform a Frozen Aura will be caught in a fragile casing of ice. Frozen foes will break free if attacked. Frozen Aura deals no significant damage. Recharge: Slow
